CustomField.description: This field is optional and can be collected as part of a workflow. It represents the length of time from the opening date of the time deposit to the maturity date (for example, 91 days and 18 months).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The length of time from the opening date of the time deposit to the maturity date (e.g. 91 days 18 months).
CustomField.label: CD Term
